#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int SizeOfNum(int n);


int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,size,n1,n2,flag=0;
        cin>>n;
        n1=n;
        size=SizeOfNum(n)*9;
        n1-=size;n2=n1;
        while(1)
        {
            int sum=0;
            flag=0;
            n2=n1;
            while(n2>0)
            {
                sum+=n2%10;
                n2/=10;
            }
            n2=n1;
            n2+=sum;
            if(n2==n)
            {
                flag=1; break;
            }
            if(n1>=n) break;
            n1++;
        }
        if(flag==1) cout<<n1<<"\n";
        else cout<<"NONE\n";
    }
  return 0;
}

int SizeOfNum(int n)
{
    int c=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        n/=10;
        c++;
    }
    return(c);
}
